description: This file defines the Entity Framework Core database context for the social networking backend, establishing the data models, entity relationships, and constraints such as indexes and foreign keys.

classes.name: AppDbContext
classes.description: The primary database context class for managing social network data including users, friend requests, and messages.

methods.name: AppDbContext
methods.description: Constructor that accepts database context options and passes them to the base DbContext.

methods.name: OnModelCreating
methods.description: Configures entity properties, indexes, and relationships for the database schema.

search-terms: Unique indexes on Email and UserName
